Hero.title: The #1 family safety and home address solution.
Hero.description: The smart Address system that connects you Anywhere, Anytime. Addrezza is offering Individuals, Businesses, and Institutions with the power of a precise locations and addressing system.

userTypes.title: Who we serve
userTypes.description: Addrezza serves individuals, businesses, and institutions with tailored solutions.

individual.title: Individuals
individual.description: Get a unique address for mail, packages, and sharing your location.

business.title: Businesses
business.description: Manage deliveries, inventory, and share locations with customers.

finance.title: Financial Institutions
finance.description: Secure addresses for identity verification, transactions, and account management.

government.title: Government Agencies
government.description: Streamline service delivery, regulation enforcement, and resource management.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Providers
healthcare.description: Ensure accurate care delivery, record management, and service coordination.

logistics.title: Logistics Companies
logistics.description: Track shipments, optimize routes, and manage fleets efficiently.

Solution.title: “Everyone deserves to be found”
Solution.p1: Addrezza offers GPS-ENABLED smart devices for accurate front door location addresses.
Solution.p2: The Addrezza Kare One device will serve as your permanent globally recognized home address for Individuals, homes, business, and things. Usable offline for seamless geolocation and constant accessibility.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: We provide a wide range of services to meet your needs.

homeAddressing.title: Home Addressing
homeAddressing.description: A secured and reliable alternative for homeowners. Be like the rest of the world and have a sharable Address

deliveryLogistics.title: Delivery and Logistics
deliveryLogistics.description: Order and have your groceries, packages, and parcels delivered to your front door

protectLovedOnes.title: Protect Your Loved Ones
protectLovedOnes.description: From your friends, kids, aged family, pets, etc, know where they are all the time and keep them safe

medicalEmergency.title: Medical Emergency
medicalEmergency.description: Your health is our priority. Addrezza devices will bring medical services, Police safety, fire trucks, etc right to you.

findMissingItems.title: Find Missing Items
findMissingItems.description: Never lose any item again with Addrezza. Our mini devices will help you tag, and find anything from phones, keys, backpack, etc.

Products.p: We offer a wide range of products to meet your needs.

kareOne.title: Kare One
kareOne.description: Your alternate home address system and management tool

kareTwo.title: Kare Two
kareTwo.description: Designed for friends, aged family members, kids, pets, and other home items.

kareThree.title: Kare Three
kareThree.description: Modern gps wristbands for children. The safety of our kids is most important track, know where they are all the time.

kareFour.title: iKare
kareFour.description: Smart GPS and Health Monitoring wristwatches best for luxury gifts

kareFive.title: Dash One
kareFive.description: Ideal for fleet management and car tracking solutions

kareSix.title: Kare Three
kareSix.description: The Kare Three device is a GPS-enabled smart device that provides accurate front door location addresses.

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.description: We provide a wide range of services to meet your needs.

stepOne.title: Reserve Your Address
stepOne.description: Order and reserve your Addrezza home address

stepTwo.title: Get the App
stepTwo.description: Get the Addrezza mobile app and setup your account

stepThree.title: Activate Your Address
stepThree.description: Receive and activate your Addrezza home address

stepFour.title: Start Using
stepFour.description: Start managing your home and address

closing.title: Ready to join the future of Addressing?
closing.description: The future of Addressing is here. Let's connect Africa like America, UK, and the rest of the world. We can't wait for the world to catch up to us anymore, we must take giant leaps to meet the rest of the world and Addrezza is the beginning to connect you with anyone, anywhere in Real-time.

benefits.title: Why you should get your Addrezza devices
benefits.description: We provide a wide range of services to meet your needs.

benefitOne.title: Alternate Home Address
benefitOne.description: Own a sharable Home address and have people meet you right at home.

benefitTwo.title: Precision Location Services
benefitTwo.description: Accurately find anyone and anything in your care

benefitThree.title: Security
benefitThree.description: Decide who comes to your location

benefitFour.title: Opportunities
benefitFour.description: Access local and global income generating opportunities.

benefitFive.title: Commerce
benefitFive.description: Let's revolutionize shopping, and get your orders delivered to your home
